text: Eeva Irmeli Ahtisaari (née Hyvärinen, born 18 June 1936) is a Finnish teacher and historian. He was the First Lady of Finland from 1994 to 2000. She was married to the late 10th President of Finland Martti Ahtisaari. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish historians Category:First Ladies Category:Teachers
title: Eeva Ahtisaari
